snippet: The Internet company said it would lay off 2,000 out of 14,000 employees as part of a broader restructuring effort under Scott Thompson, the new chief executive.
abstract: Yahoo says it will lay off 2,000 employees, or about 14 percent of its work force, as part of a broader restructuring effort.
lead_paragraph: The Internet company said it would lay off 2,000 out of 14,000 employees as part of a broader restructuring effort under Scott Thompson, the new chief executive.

headline.main: Yahoo Says It Plans to Cut Another 2,000 Jobs
headline.print_headline: Yahoo Says It Plans to Cut Another 2,000 Jobs
